dcterms:creator: Rémi Cardon
Natalia Grabar
Cyril Grouin
Thierry Hamon
dcterms:description: DEFT is a subset of 167 clinical cases from the CAS corpus, introduced in the DEFT challenge in 2020. This corpus is annotated with 13 types of clinical entities and five attributes, divided into a training set of 85 documents, a validation set of 20 documents, and a test set of 62 documents.
dcterms:title: DEFT

dcterms:creator: Bernardo Magnini
Begona Altuna
Alberto Lavelli
Manuela Speranza
Roberto Zanoli
dcterms:description: E3C is a European corpus of clinical cases, specifically the French sub-corpus, which comprises 1,615 clinical cases collected in the public domain. It is annotated with 6 types of named clinical entities, including CLINENTITY, associated with a Concept Unique Identifier from the UMLS metathesaurus.
dcterms:title: E3C

dcterms:creator: Aurélie Névéol
Cyril Grouin
Jeremy Leixa
Sophie Rosset
Pierre Zweigenbaum
dcterms:description: QUAERO French Med comprises documents belonging to two text genres: the EMEA subcorpus, which includes 13 patient information leaflets from the European Medicines Agency, and the MEDLINE subcorpus, consisting of 2,500 titles of scientific articles indexed in the MEDLINE database. The entire corpus is annotated with 10 types of clinical entities derived from UMLS semantic groups.
dcterms:title: QUAERO French Med
